washHands: Wash your hand often with soap and running water frequently
cougningAndSneezing: When coughing and sneezing cover mouth and nose with flexed elbow or tissue
throwAwayTissue: Throw tissue into closed bin immediately after use
socialDistancing: Avoid close contact and keep the physical distancing
seekMedicalCare: Seek medical care early if you have fever, cough, and difficulty breathing
